Property.name: Restrictions
Property.val: Protocol applies to soft tissue tumors of intermediate (locally aggressive) and intermediate (rarely metastasizing) potential and malignant soft tissue tumors.

DisplayedItem.name: DI_57708
DisplayedItem.title: The use of this template is recommended for reporting biopsy specimens, but is not required for accreditation purposes.

ListItem.name: LI_59746
ListItem.title: Head and neck (specify site, if known)

ListItem.title: Trunk and extremities (specify site, if known)

ListItem.title: Abdominal visceral organs (specify site, if known)

ListItem.name: LI_50383
ListItem.title: Thoracic visceral organs (specify site, if known)

Question.name: Q_352426
Question.title: Histologic Type (World Health Organization [WHO] Classification of Soft Tissue Tumors) (Note C)

DisplayedItem.name: DI_352459
DisplayedItem.title: # The list is derived from the 2020 World Health Organization (WHO) classification of soft tissue tumors, edited to include ONLY soft tissue tumors of intermediate (locally aggressive and rarely metastasizing) potential and malignant soft tissue tumors for which anatomical staging using the AJCC system is considered to be clinically relevant.

Question.name: Q_380025
Question.title: Percentage of Hypercellular Areas (formerly known as round cells)

ListItem.title: Congenital spindle cell rhabdomyosarcoma with VGLL2/NCOA2/CITED2 rearrangements

ListItem.name: LI_352443
ListItem.title: Intraosseous spindle cell rhabdomyosarcoma (with TFCP2/NCOA2 rearrangements)

ListItem.title: Epithelioid malignant peripheral nerve sheath tumor

ListItem.name: LI_352454
ListItem.title: Epithelioid sarcoma, proximal or large cell type

ListItem.name: LI_25370
ListItem.title: Clear cell sarcoma of soft tissue

ListItem.name: LI_352455
ListItem.title: Round cell sarcoma with EWSR1-non ETS fusions

Question.name: Q_6711
Question.title: Histologic Grade (French Federation of Cancer Centers Sarcoma Group [FNCLCC]) (Note D)

ListItem.name: LI_366683
ListItem.title: Specify mitotic rate per 10 high-power fields (HPF)

Question.name: Q_374449
Question.title: Percentage of Viable Tumor (compared with pretreatment biopsy, if available)

Question.title: Distance from Tumor to Closest Margin

Question.title: Other Close Margin(s) to Tumor (less than 2 cm)
